content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?>  <reference anchor='I-D.abdo-hostid-tcpopt-implementation'> <front> <title>HOST_ID TCP Options: Implementation & Preliminary Test Results</title>  <author initials='E' surname='Abdo' fullname='Elie Abdo'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='M' surname='Boucadair' fullname='Mohamed Boucadair'>     <organization /> </author>  <author initials='J' surname='Queiroz' fullname='Jaqueline Queiroz'>     <organization /> </author>  <date month='July' day='16' year='2012' />  <abstract><t>This memo documents the implementation of the HOST_ID TCP Options. It also discusses the preliminary results of the tests that have been conducted to assess the technical feasibility of the approach as well as its scalability.  Several HOST_ID TCP options have been implemented and tested.</t></abstract>  </front>  <seriesInfo name='Internet-Draft' value='draft-abdo-hostid-tcpopt-implementation-03' /> <format type='TXT'         target='http://www.ietf.org/internet-drafts/draft-abdo-hostid-tcpopt-implementation-03.txt' /> </reference>
